display.title: roundcube webmail
display.label: roundcube
display.description:
Roundcube webmail...

...is a browser-based multilingual IMAP client with an application-like user interface. It provides full functionality you expect from an email client, including MIME support, address book, folder manipulation, message searching and spell checking.

template_files.content:
<?php


$config = array();

// log driver:  'syslog' or 'file'.
$config['log_driver'] = 'syslog';
// Log successful/failed logins to <log_dir>/userlogins or to syslog
$config['log_logins'] = true;

// Log session authentication errors to <log_dir>/session or to syslog
$config['log_session'] = true;



$config['db_dsnw'] = 'mysql://_Engines_Environment(dbuser):_Engines_Environment(dbpasswd)@_Engines_System(mysql_host)/_Engines_Environment(dbname)';

$config['default_host'] = 'ssl://imap._Engines_System(default_domain):993';
$config['default_port'] = 993;
$config['imap_auth_type'] ='plain';
 $config['imap_conn_options'] = array(
   'ssl'         => array(
     'verify_peer'  => true,
     'verify_depth' => 3,
     'cafile'       => '/usr/local/share/ca-certificates/engines_internal_ca.crt',
   ),);
   
$config['smtp_server'] = '_Engines_System(smtp_host)';
$config['smtp_port'] = 25;
$config['smtp_user'] = '';

// SMTP password (if required) if you use %p as the password Roundcube
// will use the current user's password for login
$config['smtp_pass'] = '';

// provide an URL where a user can get support for this Roundcube installation
// PLEASE DO NOT LINK TO THE ROUNDCUBE.NET WEBSITE HERE!
$config['support_url'] = '';

// Name your service. This is displayed on the login screen and in the window title
$config['product_name'] = 'Roundcube Webmail';

// this key is used to encrypt the users imap password which is stored
// in the session record (and the client cookie if remember password is enabled).
// please provide a string of exactly 24 chars.
// YOUR KEY MUST BE DIFFERENT THAN THE SAMPLE VALUE FOR SECURITY REASONS
$config['des_key'] = '_Engines_System(random(24))';

// List of active plugins (in plugins/ directory)
$config['plugins'] = array(
    'archive',
    'zipdownload',
);


$config['skin'] = 'larry';
